result.execSummary:
All charges against Wasim K Hakim in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Wasim K Hakim is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Notice of Hearing for 6/2/2022 830am Preliminary Hearing, copies of bail/bond forms and State Public Defender info sheet returned as not deliverable, unable to forward

ADDRESS INFO for Wasim K Hakim
Current: 115 W Doty Street, Dane County Jail, Madison, WI 53703 United States  (Effective: 05-27-2022)
Prior: 1819 Aberg Ave, Madison, WI 53704 United States
Defendant failed to post cash bail
Preliminary hearing on June 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CASH BAIL TO BE POSTED BY 5/18/2022 AT 4:00 PM OR A WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED. 
- Defendant shall report to the Dane County Jail to complete the booking/fingerprinting process within 10 days of today. 
- Defendant shall not be at any Walmart. 
- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
Parties did not stipulate to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 17 

Defendant has acknowledged and agreed to terms and conditions of bond. Defendant must return signed bond form within 10 days of today. Any bail money previously posted will not be returned until a signed bond form is on file with the Clerk of Courts.

09:39 AM Defendant appeared.  Andrea Beth Raymond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant has NOT received a copy of the Complaint and waived receipt. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts. COURT TO MAIL COPY OF COMPLAINT TO DEFENDANT.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
